name: Omega
blurb: An artistic, exploration-platformer with a strong focus on player choice.

rewards.reward: THE GAME -\r\nThanks for backing Omega! You'll receive a free digital copy of Omega (DRM free) upon completion!
DIGITAL COLLECTOR'S EDITION -\r\n\r\nA DRM free copy of the game, soundtrack, and art and design book! All digital.

BETA TESTER -

You will receive the Digital Collector's Edition (digital copies of the game, soundtrack, and art and design book) and gain playable access to beta builds of the levels in Omega as they are being developed. You will also gain access to a beta testing section of Omega's forums, where you can get actively involved in development - providing feedback, suggestions, critique, etc, discussing the direction the game develops with myself and other beta testers.

You will also appear in the credits as a beta tester, as an extra thank you for helping with Omega's development!

SOUNDTRACK -

You will receive a physical copy of Omega's soundtrack, along with everything from the Beta Tester reward tier.

The soundtrack is in a stylish recycled cardboard sleeve (more expensive than jewel casing or standard cardboard, but you and I are environmentally friendly!) - See the image down below in the "Rewards" section for a visual reference.

For shipping outside of the UK, please add £3.

ART AND DESIGN BOOK -

You will receive a physical copy of Omega's art and design book, along with everything from the Beta Tester reward tier.

This book will be filled with artwork from the game and its creative process, as well as documenting the development of Omega. Artwork, level design, early concepts, and much more - See the images down below in the "Rewards" section for visual references.

For shipping outside of the UK, please add £5.

COLLECTOR'S EDITION -

A physical copy of the game, soundtrack, and art and design book, packaged inside a beautiful limited edition box. The game will also feature unique artwork for the main menu, so you'll never forget how exclusive this version of the game is! On top of that, you'll still get everything from the Beta Tester reward tier!

See the images down below in the "Rewards" section for visual references.

For shipping outside of the UK, please add £10.

CONCEPT ART -

I will create a unique piece of concept art for Omega, under your direction and creative vision. You can be as detailed or as vague as you like with the description! This piece will be sent to you personally, and no-one else. However, it will also appear prominently in the Art and Design book, with your name if you consent to its use, to thank you for your generous donation. Everyone with the digital or physical art book will be able to see your design and your dedication to Omega.

You will also receive everything from the Collector's Edition tier (including the beta testing access).

For shipping outside of the UK, please add £10.

DESIGN YOUR WOLF -

I will work alongside you to create your own unique wolf design. In-game, other players will see this wolf as a part of their pack, and you alone will have the exclusive option of being able to choose to play as the default Omega wolf, or as your own wolf.

Secondly, I will create some detailed concept art for this wolf that will feature prominently in the Art and Design book along with your name (should you consent to its use) so that everyone else who owns the digital or physical copy of the art book can see your design and your dedication to Omega.

You will also receive everything from the Collector's Edition tier (including the beta testing access).

For shipping outside of the UK, please add £10.
